message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1350000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
